md:
giải nghĩa từ "adhesive" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Adhesive (noun) - chất kết dính, chất dính
	+ Meaning: a substance that sticks or bonds two or more things together
	+ Example: "The adhesive on the band-aid was strong enough to hold it in place."
	+ Related words: glue, sticky, bond, attach

* Adhesive (adjective) - dính, kết dính
	+ Meaning: having the ability to stick or bond to something
	+ Example: "The adhesive properties of the tape made it perfect for wrapping gifts."
	+ Related words: sticky, tacky, clingy, bonding

Note: The word "adhesive" can be used as both a noun and an adjective, depending on the context in which it is used.

    • Related words: glue, sticky, bond, attach

  • Adhesive (adjective) - dính, kết dính

    • Meaning: having the ability to stick or bond to something
    • Example: "The adhesive properties of the tape made it perfect for wrapping gifts."
    • Related words: sticky, tacky, clingy, bonding

Note: The word "adhesive" can be used as both a noun and an adjective, depending on the context in which it is used.
